text: 6. Take risks. Be daring. Go when no one wishes to venture because it's the only way you set records. There's too many out there that are happily just sitting in their comfort zone. Remember what we said right in the beginning of this module. The only time that you're ever going to see the magic and see where the fun things happen is when you step out of your comfort zone. Don't be afraid to take risks. Don't be afraid If you do take risks and you step out of your comfort zone, you will be part of the exclusive 5% that make it in the trading industry. Don't fear the unknown. Just like the general says, it was scary knowing that there are sharks there. But what's the point of fearing the unknown? Embrace it head on. Always stand your ground. Don't be afraid in this industry to do what you think is right. Because it's that kind of thinking that's going to make you succeed. Remember, the herd is the same 95% of people that don't succeed in this job. So stand up against them. Don't fear the unknown. In order to succeed, you will be pushed to your darkest point. Face your fear. Be calm, composed, and rely on your skills and abilities. Be your very best in the darkest hour, and you will achieve abundant success. Just like those sailors who were underwater, couldn't see a thing, didn't know what to expect. That is the darkest hour. What did they do? They didn't give up, they didn't pack it in. They continued to push on. It's when you're in the darkest hour, that's when you need to be your best. And you are going to be in many many dark hours in this trading industry. The question is how do you respond? Fatigue, frustration, doubt. Natural instincts. But if one person has overcome them, so can you. Believe in the power of hope and believe. One of the sayings I've got and one of the mantras I've got when I look up to the successful guys above me is I always say to myself, if he can do it, then so can I. There are a multitude of very successful traders. Some of them might be your mentors. Just think. If they could do it, if they could get through those tough times, whether it's the beginning of your career, whether it's a slump in your career, whether it's the best time of your career, they would have been there. They would have been beyond that as well. That means you can get beyond it too. So don't give up. Keep pushing forward. Believe in the power of hope and belief. Lastly, never, ever give up. Winners never quit. They just find another way to succeed. Let me repeat that. Never give up.
